name: Cyb3r Pukes
description:
Cyb3r Pukes

by Jordan Sendar @RadJor64

An increasingly authoritarian government has passed dangerous regulations to destroy Punk Rock. But that hasn't stopped the Cyb3r Pukes from rocking, and it certainly won't stop you from seeing their show.

Since this is a game about a band, it seems fitting to include the soundtrack for download: CyberPukes Soundtrack

If you like this game or want to keep up with my other stuff, check out http://blog.radjor.com/ and follow me at https://twitter.com/radjor64 .  

If you are hesitant to spend the ~10-15 minutes to play my game, or if I failed to infer the rules well enough, take a look at some youtube gameplay and come back if its kewl enough 4 u:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Yex2mBMDMo

Rules:

The rules are simple. Avoid bad tiles by staying on good tiles. Hit a certain number of red tiles to advance to the next section. If you get to the front, you win. As the game progresses, things speed up.
